caption:
This photograph shows a dramatic seascape with a rugged coastal environment. The central focus of the image is a large, wooden two-story building positioned right on the edge of a choppy and tumultuous sea. The building appears to be a pier or dock structure, part of which extends into the water where waves are crashing against the pilings dramatically, creating splashes. This structure includes antennae and a porch-like extension, suggesting it may serve a specific functional or observational purpose. 

In the foreground, there is an expanse of eroded shoreline with jagged rocks and debris indicating recent or ongoing coastal erosion. A notable feature is a large, uprooted tree trunk lying across the rocks, testament to the powerful natural forces at work in this area.

To the right of the image stands a lone figure, possibly observing the scene or contemplating the power of nature. This person adds a human element to the scene, providing scale and emphasizing the rough conditions.

The sky is overcast, with clouds filling the background, contributing to a moody and somewhat ominous atmosphere that complements the turbulent sea and wind-swept landscape. Overall, the photograph captures a sense of isolation and the enduring struggle between man-made structures and the relentless force of nature.
title: Fierce waves wash away the sand from this rocky shore.
